8fit: Your Lifestyle Coach

Brief: 8fit isnâ€™t just a workout app. It's your end-to-end solution for achieving personal fitness, crafting a tailored lifestyle, and embracing positive change. With a focus on both exercise and nutrition, 8fit stands out as a lifestyle coach ready to guide you towards the best version of yourself. Regardless of your fitness level, 8fit adapts to help you realize your potential without the need for gym memberships or expensive equipment.
